content: this listing is for the marguerite square a crochet square pattern for creating a crochet afghan the marguerite square is a crochet square designed to work with other squares to create a crochet afghan designed specifically for a make-a-long which featured crochet square patterns by other designers as well this beautiful square aims to embody beauty and strength with puff stitches and small lace-like details this square has a ton of beautiful texture while remaining strong in it s finish skill level intermediate- crocheters looking to follow this square crochet pattern should know how to work in closed rounds you should also have an understanding of creating chain spaces and working into them you should know basic stitches such as single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet and treble_crochet you will also need to know how to work a puff which is explained in the special stitches section pattern includes 1 full version pdf with photo tutorial the photo tutorial is written in full sentences not short hand to ensure confidence working the crochet square 2 printer friendly pdf with only one picture to save ink terms used us standard pattern is written in english size finished crochet square is approximately 8 inches x 8 inches in size materials required medium 4 weight acrylic yarn of your choice you will need approximately 1 2 oz / 35g / 60 yards tools 5 mm h-8 hook tapestry needle scissors stitch markers make sure to tag me in your instagram photos so i can show you some love tag @theloopholefoxcrochet or use #theloopholefoxcrochet to show me your finished work happy crocheting the loophole fox
